definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Wash and disinfect all surfaces and utensils that have been in contact with the raw meat.
sentences.chinese: 清洗和消毒与生肉接触的所有表面和器具。

sentences.english: The roast beef and deviled crab are very good today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的烤生肉和炒辣味蟹都很好。

sentences.english: He dumped chunks of raw, pink meat into the oil, which sputtered furiously.
sentences.chinese: 他把大块的生肉扔到滋滋响的油锅里。

sentences.english: Raw meat must be kept separate from cooked meat.
sentences.chinese: 生肉和熟肉必须分开存放。

sentences.english: P27 Vacuum Packaging Vacuum packaging may only be used for portioning raw meat , poultry or fish .
sentences.chinese: 真空包装可能只适用于将生肉，家禽或鱼的分配。

sentences.english: Separate raw meat from cooked or ready-to-eat foods to avoid contamination.
sentences.chinese: 将生肉与煮熟或直接入口食物分开以避免污染。

sentences.english: Both types of bacteria are dealt with by thorough cooking and hand washing.
sentences.chinese: 彻底煮熟这些生肉以及洗干净手可以消灭这两种细菌。

sentences.english: Come to Jia Siang. Jia Siang is a famous restaurant that specializes in Meat Noodle.
sentences.chinese: 家香生肉面在本地是相当有名的一家生肉面专卖店。

sentences.english: Come to Jia Siang. Jia Siang is a famous restaurant that specializes in Meat Noodle.
sentences.chinese: 家香生肉面在本地是相当有名的一家生肉面专卖店。

sentences.english: Steak Two great examples of raw cow include beef carpaccio and steak tartare.
sentences.chinese: 寿司是非常常见的食物，其中包含生鱼到生肉的菜色。

sentences.english: Always keep raw meat and its juices separate from cooked food.
sentences.chinese: 始终保持生肉及其果汁熟食分开。

sentences.english: The family slaughters a reindeer every couple of weeks, eating it raw and with pasta.
sentences.chinese: 每个家庭每两个星期杀一只驯鹿，就着面吃生肉。

sentences.english: This seems to only apply if you buy raw meats.
sentences.chinese: 似乎只有在买生肉的时候，这条建议才会被想起。

sentences.english: She was nauseated by the stench of burning flesh.
sentences.chinese: 她闻见生肉燃烧的臭气直作呕。
